name: Hell's Vault
description:
Fullscreen is recommended. The browser version may not run well on older devices, so a download for windows is also available. If the game loses focus, try left clicking on the window, or refreshing the page.

Hell's Vault is a fast paced bullet hell action game where the arena is always shrinking. Fight through the 9 circles of hell to open the vault and claim your reward!

FEATURES
  • 7 different ways to upgrade your character
  • 4 different characters to unlock with unique playstyles
  • 9 stages and 3 bosses to fight
  • 19 different enemies with a variety of bullet patterns
  • 4 different abilities to use
  • 6 awesome songs
CONTROLS

(Also listed in-game)

MoveWASDShootLeft ClickAbilitySpacePausePFullscreenAlt+Enter CREDITS

Programming - Dogtopius (https://dogtopius.itch.io/)

Soundtrack - Facemeltingsolos (https://facemeltingsolos.itch.io/)
